001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.StaticFactory;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Floats;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
011
012/**
013 * A {@link Regime} decorator that implements <em>early stopping</em>
014 * based on lack of improvement in the objective (loss).
015 *
016 * <p>This regime monitors the relative improvement in loss between epochs
017 * using an {@link ObjectiveReportingRegime}. If the improvement falls below
018 * a configured threshold for more than {@link #getMaxStalledEpochs()} epochs
019 * in a row, training is terminated early. This prevents wasting time on
020 * epochs that do not lead to meaningful progress.</p>
021 *
022 * <h3>Behavior</h3>
023 * <ul>
024 *   <li>Wraps the delegate regime with an {@link ObjectiveReportingRegime}
025 *   if it is not already one.</li>
026 *   <li>Each call to {@link #train} checks the last recorded relative
027 *   improvement.</li>
028 *   <li>If the improvement is greater than the configured
029 *   {@link #getMinImprovement()}, the stall counter is reset to zero.</li>
030 *   <li>If the improvement is less than or equal to the threshold,
031 *   the stall counter is incremented.</li>
032 *   <li>If the stall counter exceeds {@link #getMaxStalledEpochs()}, the
033 *   {@link #train} call returns immediately and {@link #terminated} is set
034 *   to {@code true}.</li>
035 * </ul>
036 *
037 * @see ObjectiveReportingRegime
038 * @see DelegatedRegime
039 */
040@Strategy(role = Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
041public class StopIfNoImprovementRegime extends DelegatedRegime {
042
043    private int maxStalledEpochs;
044    private float minImprovement;
045    private volatile int currentStalled;
046    private volatile int lastEpoch;
047    private volatile boolean terminated;
048
049    /**
050     * Static factory for creating a {@code StopIfNoImprovementRegime}.
051     * <p>If the given regime is not already an {@link ObjectiveReportingRegime},
052     * it will be wrapped in one to measure loss improvements. Optionally,
053     * loss values can be dumped to the console.</p>
054     *
055     * @param regime           the underlying regime to delegate to
056     * @param maxStalledEpochs maximum consecutive epochs with insufficient improvement before stopping
057     * @param minImprovement   minimum relative improvement threshold (percentage) to be considered progress
058     * @param dumpLosses       whether to print loss values during training
059     * @return a configured {@code StopIfNoImprovementRegime}
060     */
061    @StaticFactory
062    public static StopIfNoImprovementRegime create(Regime regime, int maxStalledEpochs, float minImprovement, boolean dumpLosses) {
063        ObjectiveReportingRegime objectiveReportingRegime = regime instanceof ObjectiveReportingRegime
064                ? (ObjectiveReportingRegime) regime
065                : new ObjectiveReportingRegime(regime, false);
066        objectiveReportingRegime.setDumpingLossValues(dumpLosses);
067        return new StopIfNoImprovementRegime(objectiveReportingRegime, maxStalledEpochs, minImprovement);
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Creates a new stop-if-no-improvement regime.
072     *
073     * @param regime           the reporting regime to delegate to
074     * @param maxStalledEpochs maximum consecutive stalled epochs before stopping
075     * @param minImprovement   minimum relative improvement to avoid being counted as stalled
076     */
077    private StopIfNoImprovementRegime(ObjectiveReportingRegime regime, int maxStalledEpochs, float minImprovement) {
078        super(regime);
079        this.maxStalledEpochs = maxStalledEpochs;
080        this.minImprovement = minImprovement;
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * @return the maximum number of consecutive stalled epochs tolerated
085     */
086    public int getMaxStalledEpochs() {
087        return maxStalledEpochs;
088    }
089
090    /**
091     * Sets the maximum number of consecutive stalled epochs tolerated.
092     */
093    public void setMaxStalledEpochs(int maxStalledEpochs) {
094        this.maxStalledEpochs = maxStalledEpochs;
095    }
096
097    /**
098     * @return the minimum improvement threshold used to detect stalling
099     */
100    public float getMinImprovement() {
101        return minImprovement;
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Sets the minimum improvement threshold used to detect stalling.
106     */
107    public void setMinImprovement(float minImprovement) {
108        this.minImprovement = minImprovement;
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * @return the current count of consecutive stalled epochs
113     */
114    public int getCurrentStalled() {
115        return currentStalled;
116    }
117
118    /**
119     * Sets the current count of consecutive stalled epochs.
120     */
121    public void setCurrentStalled(int currentStalled) {
122        this.currentStalled = currentStalled;
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * Trains the model, but stops early if there has been insufficient
127     * improvement in the last {@link #getMaxStalledEpochs()} epochs.
128     *
129     * @param estimationFunction the model to train
130     * @param trainingSet        the dataset to train on
131     * @param objective          the objective (loss) function
132     * @param optimizer          the optimizer to apply updates
133     * @param <E>                the type of estimation function
134     */
135    @Override
136    public synchronized <E extends EstimationFunction> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer) {
137        Float improvement = ((ObjectiveReportingRegime) regime).getRelativeImprovement();
138        if (improvement != null && Floats.greaterThan(improvement, minImprovement)) {
139            currentStalled++;
140        } else {
141            currentStalled = 0;
142        }
143        if (currentStalled > maxStalledEpochs) {
144            terminated = true;
145            return;
146        }
147        lastEpoch++;
148        regime.train(estimationFunction, trainingSet, objective, optimizer);
149    }
150
151    /**
152     * Resets the internal counters and terminated flag so this regime
153     * can be reused for a new training run.
154     */
155    public void reset() {
156        terminated = false;
157        lastEpoch = 0;
158        currentStalled = 0;
159    }
160}
